questions.question: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
questions.explanation: Mars is called the Red Planet due to its reddish hue.

questions.question: What is the chemical formula for water?
questions.explanation: Water is composed of two hydrogen atoms joined with one oxygen atom.

questions.question: Who was the first president of the United States?
questions.explanation: George Washington served as the first President from 1789 to 1797.

questions.question: In which year did the World War II end?
questions.explanation: World War II ended in 1945 with the surrender of Japan.
